img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 30.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7f/Wukong_UpperHollow_30.jpg)
The good news is he won't respawn, so go all out with baiting his lunges to deflect with Rock Solid, and transform as needed to dish out as much damage as possible to send him sprawling.
img_below_text:
Once he's defeated, you can lure down the first of several Puppet Spiders just past the stairs, but be sure to also turn around to find a small path up to an alcove with a green Wisp, and a ledge that will drop you back into the hanging cocoon passage.
![Wukong UpperHollow 31.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/04/Wukong_UpperHollow_31.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

The good news is he won't respawn, so go all out with baiting his lunges to deflect with Rock Solid, and transform as needed to dish out as much damage as possible to send him sprawling."
            - Following Text: "Once he's defeated, you can lure down the first of several Puppet Spiders just past the stairs, but be sure to also turn around to find a small path up to an alcove with a green Wisp, and a ledge that will drop you back into the hanging cocoon passage.
![Wukong UpperHollow 31.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/04/Wukong_UpperHollow_31.jpg)"

            Your task:

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player has just defeated an enemy and is in a cave-like environment with spider webs and rocky terrain. The character is seen collecting an item called "Licorice" (x2). The preceding text suggests the player has just finished a challenging battle, and the following text indicates the next steps involve luring down Puppet Spiders and exploring an alcove with a green Wisp. The image serves to illustrate the aftermath of the battle and the collection of rewards before proceeding further in the game.
